thread.title_full: Ministry recalls 2003-2005 Suzuki Ignis | Local | News | Qatar Day

author: The Peninsula Qatar
title: Ministry recalls 2003-2005 Suzuki Ignis | Local | News | Qatar Day
text:
The Ministry of Economy and Commerce has recalled 2003-2005 models of Suzuki Ignis Cars over possible ignition switch defect.
The ministry said the recall made in cooperation with Teyseer Motors,Dealers for Suzuki Cars, comes within the framework of ongoing coordination and follow-up by the ministry to ascertain the extent of car dealerships' commitment to follow up vehicles' defects and repair them to protect consumers' rights.
The ministry also stressed that it will coordinate with the dealership to follow up maintenance and repair operations and will communicate with customers to ensure implementation of the procedures to fix defects.
 The ministry urged consumers to report any abuses or irregularities by communicating with the Department of Consumer Protection and Commercial Fraud Combat which will receive complaints, suggestions and inquiries through its communication channels.
Share: Someone You Know Needs to Hear This
